AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio: location used for comparative direction, north of which Corinth and Dallas-Fort Worth are located
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Corinth: registration location of one of the vehicles involved in the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dallas-Fort Worth: registration location of one of the vehicles involved in the case, part of the metroplex
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road where the vehicles were traveling, characterized as a sparsely traveled road with a reputation as a smuggling route
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer immigration checkpoint: location where Agent Montemayor arrived to investigate an attempted alien smuggling event, near the intersection of Highway 16 and U.S. 59
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexico border: International boundary where roving Border Patrol stops are conducted, proximity to which is a factor in determining reasonable suspicion
